body_html:
I've received a similar error when trying to instantiate a tflite Interpreter in Android:

java.lang.IllegalStateException: Internal error: Unexpected failure when preparing tensor allocations: tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/transpose_conv.cc:81 SizeOfDimension(input, 3) != SizeOfDimension(weights, 3) (512 != 256)Node number 34 (TRANSPOSE_CONV) failed to prepare.

From what I understand, the tflite's transpose convolution is limited to convolutions which have the same input and output channel dimensions. Why is this so, is the part which I do not understand :(

body:
I've received a similar error when trying to instantiate a tflite Interpreter in Android:

java.lang.IllegalStateException: Internal error: Unexpected failure when preparing tensor allocations: tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/transpose_conv.cc:81 SizeOfDimension(input, 3) != SizeOfDimension(weights, 3) (512 != 256)Node number 34 (TRANSPOSE_CONV) failed to prepare.

From what I understand, the tflite's transpose convolution is limited to convolutions which have the same input and output channel dimensions. Why is this so, is the part which I do not understand :(
